title: PAM / CyberArk Specialist
description_html:
About The Team

We help integrate security elements efficiently and reliably into the technological units of the client's business. We provide assurance that any changes affecting the IT environment will be fundamentally safe and allow a quick return on the client's investment. The team, which focuses on privileged access management, identities, data security and cloud security, is part of our broader Cyber Security team.

About The Manager

Martin ZboÅ™il is a leader of the Identity and Cloud Security team and his major experience lies in cloud security. Within this area, Martin also finished his PhD study. Besides cloud security, he has extensive knowledge also of many other areas of cybersecurity. Martin builds a cross-functional team that includes the IAM area and cloud security with a strong focus on protection of data in the cloud. Martin pays great attention to upskilling and personal development which might be considered also as his hobby. In his personal life, he is a sports enthusiast and among his favorite sports belong football, golf, skiing, gym, cycling, tennis and many others.

Job Description & Summary

Terms like Cyber Security, PAM, CyberArk and IAM are not new to you? As a member or our team, you will primarily participate in the implementation of CyberArk like EPV, PVWA, CPM, PSM, EPM, Conjur and various connection components in companies from different sectors. You will look for opportunities for improvement, prepare documents for implementations that will help clients to run their environment more safely and efficiently and many other diverse projects.

What we expect

  • We do not expect that you will master all of this, but we value your interest and desire to develop in the following areas, primarily in Privileged Account Management.
  • Experience with the implementation of CyberArk or other PAM and IAM technological solutions (Delinea, Wallix, SailPoint, ForgeRock, etc.)
  • Windows, Linux or MS Active Directory administration
  • Understanding of Authentication, Authorization and Cryptography
  • Knowledge of security mechanisms in processes such as Identity and Access Management, Privileged Access Management
  • Basics of scripting (e.g. in Powershell, Python)
  • Knowledge of high availability principles
  • DevOps Standards like ISO27k or NIST
  • Czech language is a MUST!

Your advantages could be:

  • Experience with keys, secrets and certificate management.
  • Project management skills.
  • Experience with Entra ID or identity management systems.
  • Achieved certification in cyber security

Our Benefits and Fun

  • Concentrated experience and rapid career growth. It may sound like a platitude, but it really is.
  • Flexible working hours.
  • Fair salary plus paid overtime and annual bonus.
  • Paid time off 20 + 5 days, 3 wellbeing days and 2 extra days off from the company at the end of the year.
  • High-end Ultrabook and iPhone with unlimited data.
  • Benefit program with 45.000 points that you can use for holidays, education, food vouchers, sports, health... Simply on what you enjoy.
  • Support for your education and development: business and digital skills training (e.g. Alteryx, Power BI, Tableau), ongoing training and certification, for example in Microsoft (Azure, PowerApps), project management (Prince2, PMI), service management (ITIL), agile development (Scrum, SAFe), DAMA, Salesforce, coaching and presentation skills and more. We pay for technical certifications and the time you spend studying them.
  • Opportunity to work in the future at a foreign PwC office, for example in the USA, Canada and there are others in the selection.
  • Extra-work activities and Away Days (team building, etc.).
  • Regular feedback on your work, also consultation with a coach with whom you can address your further development and career direction.

Check us out on: Cyber & Privacy | Czech Republic

PwC is the largest audit team in the Czech Republic, but also law, tax, consulting and technology, data or forensic teams. Find out how easy it is to combine this knowledge when you're in the right place. With us, you will get the opportunity to see how business is done in large companies. We are part of an international network of companies with more than 364,000 colleagues in 151 countries. At PwC, we create an inclusive work environment where everyone can be themselves and find their place and opportunity to develop. This year, we have successfully maintained the prestigious Equal Pay Certification, making us one of only four companies in the Czech Republic (and the only one from the Big 4) that demonstrably implements fair compensation practices regardless of gender.

Are you interested in our offer?

Let us know about yourself and we will discuss more details together!

title: Internship â€“ .NET Software Engineer (Part-Time)
description_html:
Information About The Position

Join Solar Turbines!

Are you looking to begin a career in IT or Software Engineering field?

Do you like learning technology and engineering solutions in teams of friends?

Can you commit to become one of us in Caterpillarâ€™s Solar Turbines digital team?

We are looking for enthusiastic and motivated person, who have positive attitude, good communication skills and talent to learn about software development, testing, digital technologies and technology in general. With us, you would become part of Kosice, Slovakia based team, working with international teams in agile environment, responsible for full cycle software development of digital platforms for Solar Turbines and Caterpillar.

What will be your tasks?

As an Intern â€“ .NET Software Engineer you will learn how to become strong software engineer, specialist in .NET technology. You will need to possess analytical, communication and time management skills and willingness to learn. You will contribute to the software development community delivering information technology components based on client or customer requirements. You will become part of the team responsible for developing Solar Turbinesâ€™ applications.

You will be responsible for:

  • Reviewing the requirement and design specifications
  • Developing of modern web applications
  • Developing new user-facing features
  • Design and implementation of web applications
  • Project and tasks reporting
  • Communication with team members
  • Reviewing the business requirements and design specifications

Who are we looking for?

Basic qualifications:

  • University student
  • Analytical thinking
  • Strong attention for detail
  • Excellent communication
  • Ability to learn and apply new knowledge quickly
  • Proactive approach
  • Knowledge of versioning tool (Git) and C# programming language
  • You communicate in Slovak and English (B2+)

Top candidates will also have:

  • Understanding of web technologies
  • Understanding of Agile methodology
  • Some experience with technologies & frameworks (.NET, C#, REST API, AWS/Cloud computing, HTML & CSS, etc.)
  • Ability to query database (SQL)
  • Understanding version control or continues integration concept
  • Passion for technology and an eagerness to contribute to a team-oriented environment
  • Ability to adapt quickly to a complex environment
  • Pro-active thinking - being flexible and creative
  • Self-motivated mentality - individual with passion in latest technology trends.
  • Strong communication skills and the ability to collaborate with other team members.

Requirements For The Employee

Candidates with education suit the position

University student

Language Skills

English - Upper intermediate (B2)

Other Knowledge

  • NET - Skillful

Advertiser

Brief Description Of The Company

Solar Digital as Customer Service group of Solar Turbines is the global organization responsible for InSight Platform technology and the relentless innovation of the entire ecosystem, capabilities, and customer user experience. Solar Digital is obsessively customer-centric with a passion for cutting edge technology. With deep expertise in cyber-security, machine data acquisition, software development, product knowledge, analytics, and regional teams around the world, it is dedicated to deliver digital solutions for Customer success.

Main Mission is to provide world-class secure digital solutions for asset lifecycle management to ensure our customers success. Solar Digital is building better, smarter world through technology partnerships with its customers. Highest priority is to satisfy the customer through early and continuous delivery of valuable software and services.

Contact

Contact person: Victoria Petrenko

E-mail: send CV

title: ITSM Consultant for ServiceNow - Prague
description_html:
Devoteam is an AI-driven tech consulting firm specialising in cloud platforms, cybersecurity, data, and sustainability.

Tech native for over 30 years, Devoteam guides businesses through sustainable digital transformation to deliver value.

With over 11,000 tech architects in more than 25 countries across Europe, the Middle East, and Africa, Devoteam is committed to using technology to serve people.

Devoteam has been a ServiceNow Elite Partner since 2019, and recipient of the 2025 Partner of the Year award.

Job Description

What can you expect from this position?

Are you passionate about IT consulting and eager to kick-start your career in the field? If so, the ITSM Consultant role may be the perfect opportunity for you. As a Consultant, you'll have the chance to learn and grow alongside experienced professionals, developing your skills and becoming a key asset to our team.

As a ITSM Consultant, your primary responsibilities will include:

  • Implementing ServiceNow solutions, gaining hands-on experience with the platform.
  • Learning the ins and outs of ServiceNow, including configuration, customization, and best practices.
  • Collaborating with team members to gather client requirements and assist in the development of tailored ServiceNow solutions.
  • Supporting pre-sales activities by contributing to presentations, workshops, and proposals.
  • Participating in client meetings, helping to identify their needs and providing valuable insights.


Your role will be pivotal in helping our team deliver exceptional ServiceNow solutions to our clients. While technical skills are essential, we also value your ability to communicate effectively, build relationships, and work collaboratively.

Join us in the exciting world of ServiceNow, where you can begin your career journey and make a positive impact on our team and clients alike. We believe in fostering innovation and teamwork, and you'll be an integral part of that vision.

What can you expect from working at Devoteam?

  • The opportunity to enhance and expand your skills and competences.
  • Guidance and support from experienced senior colleagues.
  • Are you seeking a company where you can connect with like-minded individuals and socialize outside of work? Look no further!
  • Feel free to check out our Cocuma page or explore the Benefits and perks section below for more information.


Qualifications

You're a great fit for this role if you have:

  • IT knowledge of Application Development technologies (JavaScript, HTML, CSS, DML/SQL, Angular.JS, web services...).
  • Strong soft skills, including communication and presentation abilities, analytical thinking and troubleshooting skills.
  • Advanced English, both written and verbal communication.
  • IT education or relevant experience in the IT industry.


Weâ€™d definitely welcomeâ€¦

  • ServiceNow certification(s).
  • Proficiency in German.


Additional Information

What will you get apart from the salary?

  • 5 weeks of vacation per year (= 1 week extra)
  • 4 My Days per year
  • Hybrid office
  • Flexible working hours
  • Career Management, training and certifications in the best breed of technologies - focused on technical skills (ServiceNow, Google), Project Management methodology etc., including Udemy for business account.
  • Meal allowance up to 32.000 CZK/year (129,50 CZK/day)
  • Cafeteria 1200 CZK/month (MultiSport Card available)
  • Phone tariff (unlimited calls, texts messages within the EU, 20GB of Internet)
  • Employee Referral Program
  • Sabbatical leave
  • Repurchase of hardware


Moreover, we offer:

  • Foreign business trips
  • Above standard working equipment
  • Company Mobile Phone (selection from Android/iPhone)
  • Company Laptop (Windows/macOS)
  • Coffee, tea, snacks and breakfasts in the office
  • Company events and teambuildings
  • Gifts for work anniversaries, promotion or childbirth
  • Friendly and open culture


And last but not least, you can rely on:

  • Transparent framework for career growth, reinforced by annual performance evaluations
  • Trust and autonomy, with no micro-management
  • Learning from senior colleagues and opportunities to collaborate with professionals from various industries
  • Opportunities to attend conferences to keep skills up-to-date
  • Working on a variety of projects for a broader range of experience
  • Adoption and utilization of evolving IT technologies
  • Usage of AI tools and access to elaborate, tailored AI training

title: Data Analyst
description_html:
About Us

Ruby Labs is a leading tech company that creates and operates innovative consumer products. We offer a diverse range of opportunities across the health, education, and entertainment industries. Our innovative teams are driving the future of consumer-led products, and we're always looking for passionate individuals to join us. Learn more about our story at: https://rubylabs.com/about-us/

About The Role

Ruby Labs is hiring a Junior Data Analyst to join our fast-paced and rapidly growing team. In this role, you will be working to create new reports and improve current reports, and working to ensure that we have safe, correct data to make decisions.

Work with a variety of products and clients, building their future data environment, and play a critical role in leveraging data to drive informed decision-making

Key Responsibilities

  • Partner with Product Owners and Data Teams.
  • Control and monitor Marketing and Product metrics in Mixpanel and Tableau.
  • Create new reports and collaborate with product owners and developers to maintain high-quality event tracking by aligning on event naming and mapping standards for new features and A/B tests.
  • Identify trends, patterns, and anomalies in data to support business insights.
  • Use SQL to get and analyse data for reports and team requests.
  • Collaborate closely with the data team to ensure consistency in reporting and data quality across the organisation.

Qualifications

  • Degree in an analytical field such as Math, Data Science or Economics.
  • At least 1 year of work experience as a Data Analyst.
  • Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to identify trends, patterns, and insights in large datasets.
  • Excellent verbal communication.
  • Ability to think strategically and make data-driven decisions that align with the organisationâ€™s goals.
  • Experience in Product Analytics.
  • Experience with Mixpanel, GA4, Amplitude or similar.
  • Basic SQL.
  • Experience with popular BI tools such as Tableau, Looker, or similar.

Nice to have

  • Strong spoken and written English.
  • Experience in Marketing Analytics.
  • Experience with Python, R.
  • Experience with GCP, BigQuery.
  • Experience with Google Ads, Facebook Ads etc.
  • Experience with orchestration frameworks such as Airflow.
  • Experience with git and code review process.

Location

Ruby Labs operates within the CET (Central European Time) zone. Applicants from any country are welcome to apply for the position as long as they are located within approximately Â± 4 hours of CET. This ensures optimal collaboration and communication during working hours.

Benefits

Discover the perks of being part of our vibrant team! We offer:

  • Remote Work Environment: Embrace the freedom to work from anywhere, anytime, promoting a healthy work-life balance.
  • Unlimited PTO: Enjoy unlimited paid time off to recharge and prioritize your well-being, without counting days.
  • Paid National Holidays: Celebrate and relax on national holidays with paid time off to unwind and recharge.
  • Company-provided MacBook: Experience seamless productivity with top-notch Apple MacBooks provided to all employees who need them.
  • Flexible Independent Contractor Agreement: Unlock the benefits of flexibility, autonomy, and entrepreneurial opportunities. Benefit from tax advantages, networking opportunities, reduced employment obligations, and the freedom to work from anywhere. Read more about it here: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1tzxGX4Uu7Ts_HCLFXESKLnKaaBfVCPf1f9AYZPrkjJM/preview

Be part of our fast-growing team and seize this excellent opportunity for personal and professional growth!

Interview Process

After submitting your application, we conduct a thorough review which typically takes 3 to 5 days, but may occasionally take longer due to the volume of applications received. If we see a potential fit, we proceed with the following steps:

  • Recruiter Screening (40 minutes)
  • Technical Interview (60 minutes)

Life at Ruby Labs

At Ruby Labs, we move fast, aim high, and expect the same from our team. Weâ€™re not here to play smallâ€”weâ€™re here to build, grow, and win. That means we look for people who are ambitious, driven, and ready to give their best every single day.

This is a place for individuals who thrive under pressure, embrace challenges, and see opportunity in every obstacle. If youâ€™re hungry to achieve, motivated by impact, and want to grow at the speed of your own ambition, Ruby Labs offers the platform to make it happen.

Here, effort is matched with reward. We recognise those who go all in and deliver results, and we create space for people who want more-more responsibility, more growth, and more success.

title: Junior Syste evOps Engineer
description_html:
This role is part of Aon Impact Forecasting team, a team of scientists, developers and client services colleagues together developing and supporting catastrophe models for various perils including flood, windstorm, earthquake, wildfire or terrorism.

We are looking for a person to join our Client Solutions team! We seek an enthusiastic system engineer skilled in DevOps who will work closely with our development team and support applications on Azure cloud.

What The Day Will Look Like

  • Development and operations of automated pipelines for Azure cloud
  • Monitoring, maintenance and troubleshooting of systems and servers
  • Deployment of service releases, patches, requests and customizations
  • Problem determination and resolution, root cause analysis, major incident management
  • Support cloud-based, web-based and app-based IF software solutions and APIs
  • Cooperation with IT/Security teams to develop robust on-prem, on-cloud and hybrid platforms
  • Cooperation with internal technology teams on implementation of Terraform templates
  • Collaboration with our project teams on regular application releases

Skills And Experience That Will Lead To Success

  • Knowledge of cloud computing principles (preferably Azure)
  • Previous experience with CI/CD process and IaC (preferably Terraform)
  • Git and branching strategies
  • Azure DevOps and GitHub
  • Knowledge of Docker
  • Knowledge of any programing language and willingness to learn others
  • Previous experience with IdP integrations is a plus (preferably Okta)
  • Knowledge of both Windows and Linux operating systems and security
  • Good communication skills, both verbal and written English, other languages are also welcome (some Czech is an advantage as the core team is based in Prague)
  • Technical and analytical mindset, willingness to learn new technologies

How This Opportunity Is Different

Interesting and varied role in a dynamic and exciting team. Being a part of Aon means having opportunities, working in a driven, encouraging, and friendly environment. We value integrity, authenticity, and a can-do approach. Working at Aon brings you an opportunity to work for a global leader in the highly attractive reinsurance industry with regional headquarter in Prague, while engaging with people all over the world. We offer flexible working and an attractive compensation package that includes pension scheme contributions, in-office massages, language courses, ergonomic tables, sick days, and many more. We have modern offices in the very centre of Prague, but we also offer flexible working hours and home office.

Please note applications are available for candidates with valid work permit in Czechia.

How We Support Our Colleagues

In addition to our comprehensive benefits package, we encourage an inclusive workforce. Plus, our agile environment allows you to manage your wellbeing and work/life balance, ensuring you can be your best self at Aon. Furthermore, all colleagues enjoy two â€œGlobal Wellbeing Daysâ€ each year, encouraging you to take time to focus on yourself. We offer a variety of working style solutions for our colleagues as well.

Our continuous learning culture inspires and equips you to learn, share and grow, helping you achieve your fullest potential. As a result, at Aon, you are more connected, more relevant, and more valued.

Aon values an innovative and inclusive workplace where all colleagues feel empowered to be their authentic selves. Aon is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace.

Aon provides equal employment opportunities to all employees and applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, creed, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, disability, veteran, marital, domestic partner status, or other legally protected status.

We are committed to providing equal employment opportunities and fostering an inclusive workplace. If you require accommodations during the application or interview process, please let us know. You can request accommodations by emailing us at ReasonableAccommodations@Aon.com or your recruiter. We will work with you to meet your needs and ensure a fair and equitable experience.

title: Junior IT Auditor/Consultant
description_html:
Place of work: Bratislava

Start date: By agreement

Contract type: full - time

Salary: EUR 1600/month

At EY, weâ€™re all in to shape your future with confidence.

Weâ€™ll help you succeed in a globally connected powerhouse of diverse teams and take your career wherever you want it to go.

Join EY and help to build a better working world.

The opportunity

Are you interested in joining a team of seasoned professionals to work on information security projects and IT audits?

At EY, you will have the opportunity to grow in the areas of IT risk identification, IT security and infrastructure, while working with globally recognized standards and methodologies.

We will provide you with the support you need to become a professional in this field.

Your Key Responsibilities

  • Participate in information system audits and information security audits as part of technical reviews in support of financial audits
  • Collaborate with international teams on verifying information security of IT services provided by service organizations such as cloud, virtualization and other widely adopted software solutions
  • As part of these reviews, you will conduct risk analysis, propose measures to eliminate identified risks and manage the implementation process
  • Provide consulting services in information and cyber security and communicate with the client on a regular basis

Skills And Attributes For Success

  • Ongoing or completed university education in a technical field or economics
  • Interest in information security
  • Fluency in Slovak and English
  • Good knowledge of MS Office
  • Strong communication skills and assertiveness
  • Initiative and enthusiasm
  • Strong analytical skills
  • Attention to detail
  • Professionalism
  • Ability to work effectively in a team

What We Offer You

  • Working Conditions and Flexibility
  • Permanent employment: we offer stable work that you can rely on.
  • Home office and flexible working hours: Schedule your week according to your needs â€“ 3 days from the office and 2 days from the comfort of your home will allow you to find a balance between work and personal life.
  • Paid overtime: We value every minute of your extra work and compensate you for it.

Vacation and Rewards

  • Bonus vacation: up to 5 extra days off above the legal minimum for your rest and recovery.
  • Bonuses and rewards: we appreciate your individual performance and will reward you for your successes.

Diverse Cafeteria Benefits To Choose From

  • Health and sports: contributions for dental care, medical check-ups, gym memberships, purchase of sports equipment...
  • Education: allowance for education to grow and develop your skills,
  • Transportation: reimbursement for public transport tickets,
  • Culture: reimbursement for tickets to the cinema, theatre, and other cultural events for your leisure time.

Personal And Family Benefits

  • Contribution for the birth of a child and wedding: we are here for you during the most important moments in your life.
  • Reward for referring a candidate: we will reward you for helping us find new talents.
  • Work anniversaries: we appreciate work anniversaries above the standard.

Technology and Education

  • iPhone 15 and laptop computer â€“ reliable partners for your work
  • Support for professional education: we fully pay the fees for certifications such as ACCA, CFA, and others.

Health and Well-being

  • Multisport card: access to various (not only) sports activities and facilities.
  • Massages at the workplace every week: enjoy a bit of relaxation while working.
  • Psychological counselling: we also care about your mental health.

Social Activities

  • Employee discounts: take advantage of discounts with our partners
  • Skiing and team-building events: we organize annual skiing trips in JasnÃ¡ and various team-building activities to strengthen the team spirit

At EY, weâ€™ll develop you with future-focused skills and equip you with world-class experiences. Weâ€™ll empower you in a flexible environment, and fuel you and your extraordinary talents in a diverse and inclusive culture of globally connected teams. Learn more.

Are you ready to shape your future with confidence? Apply today.

To help create the best experience during the recruitment process, please describe any disability-related adjustments or accommodations you may need.

EY | Building a better working world

EY is building a better working world by creating new value for clients, people, society and the planet, while building trust in capital markets.

Enabled by data, AI and advanced technology, EY teams help clients shape the future with confidence and develop answers for the most pressing issues of today and tomorrow.

EY teams work across a full spectrum of services in assurance, consulting, tax, strategy and transactions. Fueled by sector insights, a globally connected, multi-disciplinary network and diverse ecosystem partners, EY teams can provide services in more than 150 countries and territories.

title: Internship â€“ Java Software Engineer (Part-Time)
description_html:
Information About The Position

Join Solar Turbines!

Are you looking to begin a career in IT or Software Engineering field?

Do you like learning technology and engineering solutions in teams of friends?

Can you commit to become one of us in Caterpillarâ€™s Solar Turbines digital team?

We are looking for enthusiastic and motivated person, who have positive attitude, good communication skills and talent to learn about software development, testing, digital technologies and technology in general. With us, you would become part of Kosice, Slovakia based team, working with international teams in agile environment, responsible for full cycle software development of digital platforms for Solar Turbines and Caterpillar.

What will be your tasks?

As an Intern â€“ Java Software Engineer you will learn how to become strong software engineer, specialist in Java technology. You will need to possess analytical, communication and time management skills and willingness to learn. You will contribute to the software development community delivering information technology components based on client or customer requirements. title: Junior DevOps Engineer
description_html:
Place of work: BanskÃ¡ Bystrica, Bratislava, Å½ilina, Slovakia (Job with occasional home office)

Contract type: full-time, freelance

Wage (gross): 1 500 EUR/month / depending on the level of seniority â€“ details for all levels see below

Start date: ASAP


This position is filled for https://pantheon.tech/


Are you ready to launch your DevOps expert career?

If you are prepared to join a world-class team and grow fast, this is the right opportunity for you!

At PANTHEON.tech we are committed to shaping the next generation of IT professionals, currently we are looking for a Junior DevOps Engineer.


â€‹Whatâ€™s in it for you?

â€‹* Hands-on experience with cutting-edge tools and technologies

â€‹* Mentorship from industry experts

â€‹* Real-world projects to build your skills and career

â€‹* A fun, fast-paced environment where every day is a learning opportunity


â€‹What do we expect from you?

We value eagerness to learn, a passion for IT, and a problem-solving mindset, as youâ€™ll work on everything from automation and configuration management to monitoring and troubleshooting.


â€‹What will be your tasks?

Your job will involve working on prototype projects â€“ on something, that no one has ever done before. You will make sure that telcos, data centers, or ISPs stay up-to-date on latest technologies and in the end, contribute to a faster, more interconnected world. You might also end up contributing to open-source projects and upholding to principles of open coding and development.


How high can you climb?

In our company, career growth is available for everybody willing to constantly improve himself. Through regular employee assessments, there is a high possibility of promotion from Junior, through Semi-Senior, and Senior to an Expert. Since we are a family-based company, we will be glad to hear anybodyÂ´s ideas and we will happily support good projects. Our seniors are some of the best in the industry and they can teach you a lot.â€‹


Employee perks, benefits

â€‹What extras does PANTHEON throw in?

â€‹Anyone can offer you a perfect team, team buildings, LAN-parties, friendly environment, table football and a place to grow (of course, we do offer those too).

But the real benefits? Additional days off, paid sick leave, subsidized public transport, Home Office, flexible working hours and technical education, among others. You can also borrow a car from our company fleet, or go to/from work on our electric scooters!â€‹â€‹


Job Details

How much you can earn is directly related to how much you know. Your paycheck grows with your skills. You can start as a developer and make your way up or we can hire you directly as an expert. If you are a good team leader, we can even hire you directly for this position.

Here is our tentative salary ladder (gross):

  • Junior SW Engineer 1500-1900 â‚¬
  • SW Engineer (Semi-Senior) 1800 â€“ 2600 â‚¬
  • Senior SW Engineer starting at 2400 â‚¬
  • Expert / Technical Leader starting at 3000 â‚¬

The salary range is given in EUR. The salary is divided into a fixed and variable part (the variable part is paid in full unless the Code of Conduct is broken or work tasks are not performed).


Requirements for this position

  • Education: in IT / The position is suitable for a fresh graduate.
  • Language: English B2+ / We utilize SCRUM and communicate with customers worldwide on a daily basis, ENGLISH is a must.
  • Technological requirements:
  • Basic knowledge of the technologies used (DevOps, Bash, Python, UNIX/Linux)
  • Knowledge or big interest in the Networking domain is an advantage
  • Previous DevOps work experience


Apply now and begin your journey with us!


According to the relevant provisions of the Labor Code, you are required to inform the employer of all facts that may potentially hinder the performance of work or that could cause harm to the employer. You are also responsible for the truthfulness, accuracy, and completeness of such information. If the information you provide proves to be false, inaccurate, and/or incomplete, the employer reserves the right to discontinue the selection process without further notice and to terminate it, as well as the right to take any further action necessary in accordance with the law.

title: Internship â€“ .NET Software Engineer (Part-Time)
description_html:
Information About The Position

Join Solar Turbines!

Are you looking to begin a career in IT or Software Engineering field?

Do you like learning technology and engineering solutions in teams of friends?

Can you commit to become one of us in Caterpillarâ€™s Solar Turbines digital team?

We are looking for enthusiastic and motivated person, who have positive attitude, good communication skills and talent to learn about software development, testing, digital technologies and technology in general. With us, you would become part of Kosice, Slovakia based team, working with international teams in agile environment, responsible for full cycle software development of digital platforms for Solar Turbines and Caterpillar.

What will be your tasks?

As an Intern â€“ .NET Software Engineer you will learn how to become strong software engineer, specialist in .NET technology. You will need to possess analytical, communication and time management skills and willingness to learn. You will contribute to the software development community delivering information technology components based on client or customer requirements. You will become part of the team responsible for developing Solar Turbinesâ€™ applications.

You will be responsible for:

  • Reviewing the requirement and design specifications
  • Developing of modern web applications
  • Developing new user-facing features
  • Design and implementation of web applications
  • Project and tasks reporting
  • Communication with team members
  • Reviewing the business requirements and design specifications

Who are we looking for?

Basic qualifications:

  • University student
  • Analytical thinking
  • Strong attention for detail
  • Excellent communication
  • Ability to learn and apply new knowledge quickly
  • Proactive approach
  • Knowledge of versioning tool (Git) and C# programming language
  • You communicate in Slovak and English (B2+)

Top candidates will also have:

  • Understanding of web technologies
  • Understanding of Agile methodology
  • Some experience with technologies & frameworks (.NET, C#, REST API, AWS/Cloud computing, HTML & CSS, etc.)
  • Ability to query database (SQL)
  • Understanding version control or continues integration concept
  • Passion for technology and an eagerness to contribute to a team-oriented environment
  • Ability to adapt quickly to a complex environment
  • Pro-active thinking - being flexible and creative
  • Self-motivated mentality - individual with passion in latest technology trends.
  • Strong communication skills and the ability to collaborate with other team members.

Requirements For The Employee

Candidates with education suit the position

University student

Language Skills

English - Upper intermediate (B2)

Other Knowledge

  • NET - Skillful

Advertiser

Brief Description Of The Company

Solar Digital as Customer Service group of Solar Turbines is the global organization responsible for InSight Platform technology and the relentless innovation of the entire ecosystem, capabilities, and customer user experience. Solar Digital is obsessively customer-centric with a passion for cutting edge technology. With deep expertise in cyber-security, machine data acquisition, software development, product knowledge, analytics, and regional teams around the world, it is dedicated to deliver digital solutions for Customer success.

Main Mission is to provide world-class secure digital solutions for asset lifecycle management to ensure our customers success. Solar Digital is building better, smarter world through technology partnerships with its customers. Highest priority is to satisfy the customer through early and continuous delivery of valuable software and services.

Solar Digital is building better, smarter world through technology partnerships with its customers. Highest priority is to satisfy the customer through early and continuous delivery of valuable software and services.

Contact

Contact person: Victoria Petrenko

E-mail: send CV

title: ServiceNow Support Consultant
description_html:
Devoteam is an AI-driven tech consulting firm specialising in cloud platforms, cybersecurity, data, and sustainability.

Tech native for over 30 years, Devoteam guides businesses through sustainable digital transformation to deliver value.

With over 11,000 tech architects in more than 25 countries across Europe, the Middle East, and Africa, Devoteam is committed to using technology to serve people.

Devoteam has been a ServiceNow Elite Partner since 2019, and recipient of the 2025 Partner of the Year award.

Job Description

We are seeking a proactive and skilled ServiceNow Support Consultant to join our growing team. This role is crucial for ensuring the smooth operation and optimal performance of our clients' ServiceNow instances. You will be the primary point of contact for resolving incidents, fulfilling service requests, and providing expert guidance to users, helping them maximize their investment in the ServiceNow platform. The ideal candidate possesses a strong technical background in ServiceNow, excellent problem-solving abilities, and a commitment to delivering outstanding customer service.

Key Responsibilities:

Incident Resolution & Troubleshooting:

  • Serve as the primary point of contact for users reporting issues or requesting support related to ServiceNow applications (e.g., ITSM, ITOM, HRSD, CSM, GRC).
  • Diagnose, troubleshoot, and resolve complex ServiceNow incidents, providing timely and effective solutions.


Service Request Fulfillment:

  • Process and fulfill service requests within the ServiceNow platform, such as user provisioning, access management, data modifications, and minor configuration changes.
  • Ensure adherence to established service level agreements (SLAs) for all incidents and service requests.


User Support & Guidance:

  • Provide expert guidance and best practices to ServiceNow users, helping them navigate the platform and utilize its features effectively.


Configuration & Maintenance:

  • Perform routine system health checks, monitoring, and maintenance activities to ensure platform stability and performance.


Collaboration & Communication:

  • Collaborate closely with internal development teams, project managers, and other support staff to ensure seamless service delivery.


Documentation & Reporting:

  • Maintain accurate and detailed records of all support activities, resolutions, and configurations within the ticketing system.
  • Generate reports on common issues, performance trends, and service delivery metrics.


Qualifications

Requirements:

Must have:

  • Minimum 1 year of professional experience in an IT Support, Technical Support, or Application Support role, with a strong focus on ServiceNow or similar tools.
  • Proven experience in troubleshooting and resolving issues within the ServiceNow platform.
  • Solid understanding of the ServiceNow platform and its core functionalities.
  • Basic knowledge of JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and GlideScript.
  • Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills, with a methodical approach to troubleshooting.
  • Strong communication skills (written and verbal) in English, with the ability to explain technical concepts to non-technical users.
  • German language on basic communication level.
  • Strong customer service orientation and a commitment to user satisfaction.
  • Ability to work independently and manage multiple priorities in a fast-paced environment.
  • A proactive attitude and a willingness to continuously learn and adapt to new technologies.
  • Team player with strong interpersonal skills.


We prefer:

  • ServiceNow Certified System Administrator (CSA) is a big plus.
  • Additional ServiceNow certifications (e.g., CIS-ITSM, CIS-HRSD) are a significant advantage.


Additional Information

Benefits:

  • 5 weeks of vacation per year (= 1 week extra)
  • 4 â€œMy Daysâ€ per year
  • Hybrid office
  • Flexible working hours
  • Udemy for business account
  • Meal allowance up to 32.000 CZK/year (129,50 CZK/day)
  • Cafeteria 1200 CZK/month (MultiSport Card available)
  • Phone tariff (unlimited calls, texts messages within the EU, 20GB of Internet)
  • Employee Referral Program
  • Sabbatical leave
  • Repurchase of hardware


Moreover, we offer:

  • Above standard working equipment
  • Company mobile phone (selection from Android/iPhone)
  • Company laptop (Windows/macOS)
  • Coffee, tea, snacks and breakfasts in the office
  • Company events and team buildings
  • Gifts for work anniversaries, promotion or childbirth
  • Friendly and open culture


And last but not least, you can rely on:

  • Transparent framework for career growth, reinforced by annual performance evaluations
  • Trust and autonomy, with no micro-management
  • Learning from senior colleagues and opportunities to collaborate with professionals from various industries
  • Opportunities to attend conferences to keep skills up-to-date
  • Usage of AI tools and access to elaborate, tailored AI training

title: Junior CRO Specialist
description_html:
About Us

Ruby Labs is a leading tech company that creates and operates innovative consumer products. We offer a diverse range of opportunities across the health, education, and entertainment industries. Our innovative teams are driving the future of consumer-led products, and we're always looking for passionate individuals to join us. Learn more about our story at: https://rubylabs.com/about-us/

About The Role

We are looking for a Junior CRO Specialist to join our high-performing team. In this role, you will support our mission to drive measurable improvements in conversion rates across our digital products.

This position is perfect for someone eager to grow in the field of CROâ€”someone analytical, curious, detail-oriented, and keen to learn by doing. As a Junior CRO Manager, you will work closely with experienced CRO specialists, assisting in the research, planning, and execution of experiments that directly impact business outcomes. Youâ€™ll gain hands-on experience with A/B testing, funnel analysis, and UI/UX design, all while contributing to high-impact projects.

The ideal candidate is passionate about user behavior, optimization strategies, and digital experimentation, and is eager to build a career in a fast-paced, results-driven environment.

Key Responsibilities

  • Assist in conducting funnel and user behavior analyses to identify optimization opportunities
  • Support the development of hypotheses based on data insights, research, and industry best practices
  • Help design test plans and coordinate the execution of A/B and multivariate experiments
  • Collaborate with designers and developers to implement and QA test variations
  • Analyze experiment results using statistical methods and contribute to documenting insights
  • Maintain accurate records of tests and outcomes to support cross-team knowledge sharing

Qualifications

  • 6+ months of experience (internship, freelance, or entry-level role) in CRO, digital marketing, data analysis, or UI/UX
  • Basic understanding of A/B testing and digital analytics
  • Familiarity with tools such as Google Analytics, Hotjar, or similar platforms
  • Strong analytical skills and keen attention to detail
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English
  • Proactive mindset with a strong desire to learn and grow in a dynamic environment
  • Foundational understanding of UI/UX principles with the ability to create mockups that align with brand standards

Nice to have

  • Experience with CRO platforms like Growthbook, VWO, or Optimizely
  • Basic design skills using Figma, Adobe XD, Lovable, V0
  • Previous experience working remotely or within cross-functional teams
  • Interest in subscription-based business models

Location

Ruby Labs operates within the CET (Central European Time) zone. Applicants from any country are welcome to apply for the position as long as they are located within approximately Â± 4 hours of CET. This ensures optimal collaboration and communication during working hours.

Benefits

Discover the perks of being part of our vibrant team! We offer:

  • Remote Work Environment: Embrace the freedom to work from anywhere, anytime, promoting a healthy work-life balance.
  • Unlimited PTO: Enjoy unlimited paid time off to recharge and prioritize your well-being, without counting days.
  • Paid National Holidays: Celebrate and relax on national holidays with paid time off to unwind and recharge.
  • Company-provided MacBook: Experience seamless productivity with top-notch Apple MacBooks provided to all employees who need them.
  • Flexible Independent Contractor Agreement: Unlock the benefits of flexibility, autonomy, and entrepreneurial opportunities. Benefit from tax advantages, networking opportunities, reduced employment obligations, and the freedom to work from anywhere. Read more about it here: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1tzxGX4Uu7Ts_HCLFXESKLnKaaBfVCPf1f9AYZPrkjJM/preview?tab=t.0

Be part of our fast-growing team and seize this excellent opportunity for personal and professional growth!

Interview Process

After submitting your application, we conduct a thorough review which typically takes 3 to 5 days, but may occasionally take longer due to the volume of applications received. If we see a potential fit, we proceed with the following steps:

  • Recruiter Screening (40 minutes)
  • Technical Interview (90 minutes)
  • Final Interview (60 minutes)

Life at Ruby Labs

At Ruby Labs, we move fast, aim high, and expect the same from our team. Weâ€™re not here to play smallâ€”weâ€™re here to build, grow, and win. That means we look for people who are ambitious, driven, and ready to give their best every single day.

This is a place for individuals who thrive under pressure, embrace challenges, and see opportunity in every obstacle. If youâ€™re hungry to achieve, motivated by impact, and want to grow at the speed of your own ambition, Ruby Labs offers the platform to make it happen.

Here, effort is matched with reward. We recognize those who go all in and deliver results, and we create space for people who want moreâ€”more responsibility, more growth, and more success.

title: Junior Security Monitoring Operator (part-time)
description_html:
Summary

Ready to kick-start your career in cybersecurity? Join our team as a Security Monitoring Operator, learn and gather experience in our Security Operation Centre.

Job Description

This job is perfect for those looking to launch their cybersecurity career and be at the forefront of defending against digital threats. Join us and become a key player in our mission to secure the digital world!

Key Duties of Security Monitoring Operator

  • Handle basic security monitoring tasks and simple analyses, with support from more experienced teammates.
  • Talk to customers and follow the usual communication guidelines.
  • Get to know ESET XDR tools and the internal systems we use.
  • Join threatâ€‘hunting activities, follow given steps, and note down your findings.
  • Help prepare reports based on instructions from senior colleagues.
  • Keep learning new things and stay up to date with the latest security trends and technologies.
  • Jump in on other tasks your manager needs help with as part of the teamâ€™s daily work.

Our Requirements

  • Fullâ€‘time university student in Information Security or another ITâ€‘related field
  • Completed Bachelorâ€™s degree in an IT field is an advantage
  • Fundamental understanding of Windows/Linux systems and their inner workings.
  • Knowledge of computer networks (IP address, ports, protocols, MAC address, etc.)
  • Strong interest in learning new things in the field of cybersecurity
  • Responsibility and ability to work independently
  • Analytical mindset with acute attention to detail.
  • Willingness to cover mainly evening, night, and weekend shifts

Compensation: from 9â‚¬/hour

With eligibility for bonuses and benefits we offer.



At ESET, diversity, equity, and inclusion (DEI) are integral to our corporate culture. We believe in creating a respectful environment, where everyone feels valued and respected, welcoming applications from individuals of all backgrounds, including race, gender, age, religion, disability, and sexual orientation.

title: Java Software Engineer
description_html:
We are looking for a Software Engineer with a DevOps mindset to join our clientâ€™s team and contribute to the development and operation of a modern Manufacturing Execution System (MES).

You will take full end-to-end ownership of selected local business applications â€” from development and deployment to operational stability and incident/problem resolution (80% - local application support, 20% - global development).

This role offers an exciting opportunity to be part of a greenfield project, building digital solutions that support the transition to sustainable and smart manufacturing.


Working model: 100 % on-site in Kosice (offering significant flexibility)


Key responsibilities:

  • Analyse user requirements and translate them into digital functionalities and technical specifications.
  • Develop, maintain, and continuously improve software solutions, including UAT testing, rollout, and deployment.
  • Monitor and operate applications (logs, middleware, database statistics, system health).
  • Handle incidents, problems, and change requests, driving tickets to resolution.
  • Update operational documentation and ensure proper handover to factory support teams.
  • Follow up on and track pending technology issues to ensure operational stability.
  • Investigate new technologies and support DevOps automation (CI/CD where applicable).


Employee perks, benefits


  • Internal Mobility Program â€“ enjoy many opportunities for career growth, job rotations, diversity of projects & technologies
  • International, diverse, and inclusive working environment â€“ get experience in global projects for worldwide leaders and enjoy multinational teams
  • Referral Program â€“ enjoy cooperation with your colleagues and get the bonus
  • 5/10 years NATEK club â€“ we offer long-term cooperation and celebrate each fifth-year cooperation anniversary with gifts
  • NATEK CSR Events & team buildings â€“ enjoy our values: accountability, partnership and expertise and #workITwithus
  • Education â€“ benefit from our know-how, learning courses and certificates and IT events â€“ be part of community of leaders of the industry and take part as a speaker or a visitor
  • Bonuses for Personal Events â€“ we congratulate you on important events of your life: giving birth to children, university graduation, etc.
  • Benefit Plus (Cafeteria) â€“ use our e-shop with corporate benefits like travel, theatre tickets, books etc.
  • Multisport Club Card
  • Technical and Personal training â€“ we are investing in your skills growth
  • Language courses
  • 1 paid day off for volunteering â€“ we are supportive of all charity ideas
  • Meal contribution directly to your account



Language skills

English - Upper intermediate (B2)


Other knowledge

Java - Advanced

Application monitoring & troubleshooting - Advanced

Relational Databases (Oracle) - Skillful

DevOps Tooling (Azure DevOps & Git) - Skillful

Messaging - Skillful


Number of years of experience

1

Personality requirements and skills


Technical Requirements

  • Java backend development and maintenance
  • REST & SOAP APIs and web fundamentals (HTTP, HTML)
  • Application monitoring (log files, configurations, database statistics)
  • CI/CD pipelines (Azure DevOps)
  • Deploying and supporting applications on OpenShift
  • Basic understanding of containers, pods, logs, and troubleshooting

Nice to Have

  • Experience with Kafka
  • Knowledge of Angular or Node.js
  • Experience in manufacturing, MES, or industrial environments

Soft Skills

  • Strong problem-solving and analytical skillsOwnership mindset and accountability for production systems
  • Good communication skills in Slovak & English (B2)
  • Ability to work effectively in multinational teams

title: Associate Automation Engineer
description_html:
Make an impact with NTT DATA

Join a company that is pushing the boundaries of what is possible. We are renowned for our technical excellence and leading innovations, and for making a difference to our clients and society. Our workplace embraces diversity and inclusion â€“ itâ€™s a place where you can grow, belong and thrive.

Your day at NTT DATA

The Associate Automation Engineer is an entry level subject matter expert, tasked with assisting with designing, developing, and testing software systems, modules, or applications for software enhancements and new products including cloud-based or internet-related tools.

This role is accountable for assisting with for detailed design for certain modules/sub-systems, doing prototype for multi-vendor infrastructure, and showcasing it internally or externally to clients.

This role designs and develops functionality in a micro-services environment working with APIs, telemetry data, and running ML/AI algorithms on it, working with both structured and unstructured data.

Key responsibilities:

  • Receives detailed instructions to design and develop solutions and functionality that drives the growth of business.
  • Assists with writing and testing code.
  • Assists with the execution of automated testing.
  • Takes directions from various stakeholders to participate in software deployment.
  • Assists with delivering software components while working in collaboration with the product team.
  • Supports the integration and building of solutions through automation and coding, using 3rd party software.
  • Receives detailed instructions to craft, build, and debug large scale distributed systems.
  • Assists with writing, updating and maintaining the technical program, end-user documentation, and operational procedures.
  • Assists with refactoring code.
  • Assists with the reviewing of code written by other developers.
  • Performs any other related task as required.

To thrive in this role, you need to have:

  • Foundational knowledge of cloud platforms (Azure, AWS, GCP, O365) and cloudâ€‘based infrastructure, deployments, containers, and CI/CD.
  • Entryâ€‘level software development skills, including programming (C/C++, C#, Java, JavaScript, Python, Node.js), microservices, REST APIs, and API product development.
  • Understanding of data structures, algorithms, software design, large datasets, and familiarity with SQL/NoSQL databases (e.g., MongoDB, Cassandra, Elasticsearch).
  • Experience with agile/lean practices, full SDLC tools (IDE, source control, testing, tracking), and a mindset aligned with TDD and continuous delivery.

What we offer:

  • Education to the extent of agreement with the immediate supervisor
  • 5 weeks of vacation
  • 3 Sick-days per Year
  • Compensation of salary for temporary incapacity to work beyond the statutory wage compensation in the amount of the fixed basic salary for temporary absence to 21 days per year
  • Notebook and mobile phone including data tariff according to company standards.
  • Contribution to the pension insurance or Long term investment product in the amount of CZK 1 000 monthly
  • Monthly budget with regards to the predefined benefits packages (Premium health care / Benefits Cafeteria System / Multisport card)
  • Refreshment in the office (coffee, tea, water) for free

Workplace type:

Hybrid Working

About NTT DATA

NTT DATA is a $30+ billion business and technology services leader, serving 75% of the Fortune Global 100. We are committed to accelerating client success and positively impacting society through responsible innovation. We are one of the worldâ€™s leading AI and digital infrastructure providers, with unmatched capabilities in enterprise-scale AI, cloud, security, connectivity, data centers and application services. Our consulting and industry solutions help organizations and society move confidently and sustainably into the digital future. As a Global Top Employer, we have experts in more than 50 countries. We also offer clients access to a robust ecosystem of innovation centers as well as established and start-up partners. NTT DATA is part of NTT Group, which invests over $3 billion each year in R&D.

Equal Opportunity Employer

NTT DATA is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer with a global culture that embraces diversity. We are committed to providing an environment free of unfair discrimination and harassment. We do not discriminate based on age, race, colour, gender, sexual orientation, religion, nationality, disability, pregnancy, marital status, veteran status, or any other protected category. Join our growing global team and accelerate your career with us. Apply today.

Third parties fraudulently posing as NTT DATA recruiters

NTT DATA recruiters will never ask job seekers or candidates for payment or banking information during the recruitment process, for any reason. Please remain vigilant of third parties who may attempt to impersonate NTT DATA recruitersâ€”whether in writing or by phoneâ€”in order to deceptively obtain personal data or money from you. All email communications from an NTT DATA recruiter will come from an @nttdata.com email address. If you suspect any fraudulent activity, please contact us.

title: Junior ML Research Engineer
description_html:
Role Overview

As a Junior Machine Learning Research Engineer, you will contribute to developing cutting-edge technologies that safeguard businesses and individuals from fraud in the new era of large language models. Your work will center on designing and implementing intelligent systems capable of detecting subtle modifications and fraudulent activities in digital documents. You will contribute to the full cycle of machine learning model development from research and design through implementation, evaluation, and deployment, applying advanced machine learning and deep learning techniques. You will help build solutions that ensure trust, security, and integrity in document processing. 

Key Responsibilities

  • Algorithm Development & Research: Assist in the design and development of algorithms aimed at detecting modifications and anomalies in digital documents.

  • Machine Learning Model Engineering: Contribute to building, training, and evaluating machine learning models with a strong focus on fraud detection in document processing.

  • Deep Learning & Tools: Apply state-of-the-art frameworks such as PyTorch to develop and deploy scalable fraud detection models.

  • Data Management & Analysis: Work with large datasets of documents containing various fraud scenarios. Use preprocessing techniques such as cleaning, feature engineering, and augmentation to expose anomalies and strengthen model accuracy.

  • Fraud-Focused Research: Research and experiment with innovative methods to improve detection rates and minimize false positives, ensuring models are both robust and trustworthy.

What You Will Gain

This role provides an opportunity to grow and deepen your expertise in applied machine learning while directly impacting how organizations prevent fraud in the digital world. You will gain hands-on experience with advanced fraud detection systems, and work with state-of-the-art technologies in a collaborative and supportive environment.

Requirements

  • Strong foundation in machine learning concepts, with exposure to deep learning architectures.

  • Good communication and teamwork abilities in a collaborative environment.

  • At least 1 year hands-on experience with Python and familiarity with ML frameworks such as PyTorch. 

  • Basic knowledge of data preprocessing techniques (cleaning, feature extraction, augmentation) and their impact on model performance.

  • Familiarity with version control tools such as Git and collaborative coding practices.

  • Optional experience with cloud technologies (AWS, GCP, Azure)

title: Backend Engineer for Web Automation team (Node.js)
description_html:
Apify's mission is to make the web more programmable. Why? Because we believe that humans have better things to do than fill information into internet forms, compile Excel sheets of copy-pasted data, or watch thousands of videos to determine whether they include a specific brand logo. Those are jobs for a machine. And just as in the real world we have tools that make our lives easier, we should have tools to make our lives easier on the web.

Web automation can be anything. We robotize unsubscribe flows to save people money and we collect billions of rows of data from all over the world forÂ science,Â market research,Â orÂ finding lost children. Fortune 500 companies and small startups alike need this power to make great business decisions.

To support our mission, we're looking for talented and experienced engineers to help us build the next generation of the web, where machines talk to machines and humans do creative work that drives progress. Will you join us ?

Please be aware that we are currently looking only for full-time candidates living in the Czech Republic!

Who are we looking for?

  • You have a good knowledge of JavaScript & TypeScript (Node.js) and Web technologies
  • You are an avid learner and looking to grow your expertise in the web scraping domain and in general
  • You have a problem-solving mindset
  • You're able to write and speak English well
  • You have empathy and patience to understand customers and their needs
  • At minimum 1Â yearÂ of programming experience (school and self-learning counts)
  • Currently, we are only looking for a full-time commitment
  • You live in the Czech Republic and areÂ able to comeÂ to our Prague office at least once a month
  • Even better if you:
    • Have contributed toÂ a non-trivial user-facing product
    • Have experience fine-tuning products for UX/DX
    • Like to write and share experienceÂ - tutorials, technical support, tooling, etc.

What you will learn with us?

  • How websites work behind the curtain
  • How to write beautiful code that reads like a novel
  • How to write efficient cloud programs that process hundreds of millions of pages monthly
  • How to contribute toÂ collaborative open and closed sourceÂ projects and design great APIs that other devs will love to use
  • And potentially, how to build your own team and start your own projects inside the company

Our tech stack:

  • Development: Node.js (withÂ Typescript), Chrome Dev Tools, Crawlee,Â Apify SDK, Puppeteer, Playwright, JQuery/CheerioÂ + many other specialized libraries. We also released Python SDK lately and are acquiring expertise in Python scraping tools.
  • Environment: Local IDE for development & testing. ThenÂ deploy to theÂ Apify Platform via GitHub for production
  • Tools: GitHub, ZenHub, Notion, GSuite, GitHub Copilot license
  • Process: in-depth onboarding,Â code reviews, tests, automating whatever we can, using common sense over strict processes

Why should you work for Apify?

  • Full-time position in Prague at our amazing office located in Lucerna Palace, Prague, Czech Republic ğŸ°
  • Option to work remotely ğŸ›‹ï¸
  • Flexible working hours (perfect for both night owls ğŸ¦‰ and early birds ğŸ¥)
  • Zero bullshit policy â€“ No Jira, no Okta, no Confluence, no Certifiedâ„¢ScrumMastersÂ®, no quarterly estimates. Just GitHub, GSuite, Notion, Slack, and shipping stuff to production
  • Nobody counts holidays as long as the work gets done ğŸ’ª
  • Stock options and profit sharing ğŸ’°
  • We welcome pets, kids, and bikes at the office ğŸ•ğŸ‘¨â€ğŸ‘§ğŸš²
  • Epic team buildings and offsites ğŸš¢ with biking, canoeing, and other adventures ğŸª‚
  • Solid education and training budget, conference tickets, internal â€œEat & Learnâ€ sessions, and the possibility to work across teams ğŸ‘©ğŸ¼â€ğŸ’»ğŸ‘¨ğŸ½â€ğŸ’»
  • Generous hardware budget ğŸ’»
  • Free lunches every day ğŸŒ®ğŸ±ğŸœğŸ•ğŸ¥¡
  • Unlimited supply of â˜• & ğŸºÂ and snacks
  • Free entry to the wonderful Prague Zoo ğŸ˜
  • Ping-pong, chess, PS5, lightsabers, foosball league after lunch, free Multisport card, and so on

title: QA Engineer
description_html:
About Us

At Eyeball, we're revolutionizing football talent scouting from our base in Prague. Leveraging cutting-edge technology like video analysis and artificial intelligence, weâ€™ve moved beyond traditional scouting methods. Our platform captures and analyzes every moment of the game, tracking 48 different events to discover the next big talent. With a database of over 200,000 young players and partnerships with top clubs in the Premier League, Serie A, Bundesliga, and La Liga, Eyeball is setting new standards in football scouting. Join our innovative, collaborative team and be part of the change in football scouting. ğŸŒ

Job Summary

As a Junior QA Engineer, you will support our mission by executing and managing tests to ensure the quality of our software products. Working closely with our developers and Product Managers, youâ€™ll help identify issues, verify fixes, and learn to advocate for quality throughout the development lifecycle. This is a great opportunity to grow your skills in a dynamic and innovative environment.

Key responsibilities

  • Execute test plans, scenarios, scripts, or procedures to ensure products meet quality standards.Â 

  • Identify, document, and report bugs, errors, and inconsistencies in software applications.Â 

  • Work closely with the development team to reproduce issues and verify fixes.Â 

  • Participate in product design reviews to provide input on functional requirements, product designs, schedules, or potential problems.Â 

  • Review and analyze system specifications to ensure testing conditions, limits, and acceptance criteria are met.Â 

  • Maintain updated knowledge of industry trends and advancements in quality assurance testing.Â 

  • Assist in the development and implementation of QA testing policies and procedures.Â 

  • Collaborate with other team members to improve QA effectiveness and efficiency.Â 

We need:

  • 1â€“2 years of experience in a QA or testing role, with a basic understanding of QA principles and methodologies.
  • Familiarity with SQL and related databases, including basic querying.
  • Comfortable working in English, with solid communication skills to collaborate effectively in meetings and documentation.
  • Basic experience with version control systems (e.g., GitLab, GitHub, or Bitbucket).
  • Familiarity with tools like Postman for endpoint testing.
  • Strong attention to detail, eagerness to learn, and ability to work both independently and in a team.

Bonus skills

  • Exposure to mobile app testing or knowledge of unique challenges in testing mobile applications.
  • Interest in or initial experience with automated testing tools and techniques.

Why Eyeball?

  • Shape the future of football technology. Your work will be seen by clubs, players, and fans worldwide.ğŸŒ
  • Join a fast-growing, passionate team driven by innovation and impact.
  • Flexible working environment.
  • Opportunities for growth and personal development.
  • Be part of a movement to level the playing field for grassroots football.Â 
  • Corresponding remuneration. ğŸ’°
  • Possibility to work as contractor.
  • Flexible working hours. ğŸ•œ
  • Possibility to workÂ remotely fully
  • Home office. ğŸ›‹ï¸
  • 5 weeks of paid relax+ 2 sicks days. ğŸŒ´
  • Team of friendly, open-minded high achievers. ğŸ¤
